amendment.description: An amendment numbered 123 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to prohibit the use of funds to give formal notification under, or prepare, propose, implement, administer, or enforce any rule or recommendation pursuant to, section 115 of the Clean Air Act (42 USC 7415).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A073) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A073) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A073) Agreed to by voice vote.
